name: Resident Rogue
description:
A traditional-ish Roguelike surivival-horror-action game. Shoot zombies! Explore a creepy mansion which definitely doesn't have an implausibly large underground laboratory in the basement! Survive and save the world!

Any similarities to extant franchises, living or dead, is purely coincidental. Please don't sue me.

Current Status

Demo release made for Revision Jam II. The game isn't as complete or balanced as I would have liked, but I committed to releasing a demo so here it is. The game is pretty hard, and has just endless repetetive floors.

Development is ongoing. Please leave any feedback in the comment section.

A note on font/graphical rendering: During development I've been using Consolas which works pretty well, but I can't redistribute that. Some other fonts have issues with character alignment given the way I'm drawing on a grid, particularly around box drawing characters. After testing a few options, I'm using Ubuntu Mono as a good free option for the demo but it's not perfect. Longer term I need to switch to another system, probably bitmapped characters I have proper control over.
